entry.content:
Python project structure is maddening and confusing. Here is what I am trying to use:

  • my_project\
    • LICENSE
    • README.*
    • requirements.txt
    • dev-requirements.txt
    • setup.py

    • my_project2\

      • __init__.py
      • __main__.py
      • my_project.py
      • cli.py

    • docs\

    • tests\

[1]: my_project - Root project folder, git should sync here.

[2]: my_project2 - Python package root, contains modules and submodules, etc.
